players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Charlie was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
Bob: "I investigated Diana and found she is mafia. Vote her."
Diana: "I didn't kill Charlie. Bob is lying. Vote Bob."
You: "Bob, if you were detective you'd know. If you were mafia you'd lie. I vote Bob."
Diana: "I didn't kill Charlie. Bob is lying. Vote Bob."
You: "Charlie was killed, so the killer is mafia. Bob says he didn’t kill him, so he’s lying. If he were detective he’d know. Vote Bob."
Bob: "Charlie was killed by mafia. I investigated Diana and found she is mafia. She knows I'm detective, so she is lying. Vote Diana."
Votes: Alice voted for Diana (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format), Bob voted for Diana, Diana voted for Bob
Diana was arrested

players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Charlie was found dead.
You investigated Diana and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Beware, Diana knows you're the detective.
Day 1 begins.
You: "I investigated Diana and found she is mafia. Vote her."
Diana: "I didn't kill Charlie. Bob is lying. Vote Bob."
Alice: "Bob, if you were detective you'd know. If you were mafia you'd lie. I vote Bob."
Diana: "I didn't kill Charlie. Bob is lying. Vote Bob."
Alice: "Charlie was killed, so the killer is mafia. Bob says he didn’t kill him, so he’s lying. If he were detective he’d know. Vote Bob."
You: "Charlie was killed by mafia. I investigated Diana and found she is mafia. She knows I'm detective, so she is lying. Vote Diana."
Votes: Alice voted for Diana (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format), Bob voted for Diana, Diana voted for Bob
Diana was arrested
